title: Real Estate Agencies

description: Whether you're buying, selling, or renting property in the UAE, the right real estate agency can make all the difference. Homezy helps you find licensed and reviewed real estate agencies that specialize in local marketsâ€”from luxury villas in Dubai to family apartments in Abu Dhabi. whatToExpect: List your property needs or goals on Homezy and browse agencies that match your criteria. You'll receive options for in-person or virtual consultations, and can choose based on area expertise, property type, or client reviews.

faqs.question: Can I list my property for sale or rent?
faqs.answer: Yes, many agencies offer listing services and will help market your property to attract buyers or tenants.

faqs.question: Do agents handle the legal work?
faqs.answer: Most agencies assist with drafting and reviewing legal contracts, and ensure transactions comply with UAE property laws.
